subject: Coaches and Managers
Basketball
lead_paragraph: When Orlando meets the Los Angeles Lakers in the N.B.A. finals, Jeff Van Gundy, the ABC analyst, will need to deal with the presence of his older brother, Stan, the Magic’s coach.
snippet: When Orlando meets the Los Angeles Lakers in the N.B.A. finals, Jeff Van Gundy, the ABC analyst, will need to deal with the presence of his older brother, Stan, the Magic’s coach.
